channel.title: [REQ TUT] [PI] Other banking ways
channel.description: Hey guys, is there a way (or a command) that allows an npc or command take let's say 2B from your inventory and 'deposit' it? And once you talk to that npc or type a different command (like ::withdraw) it gives your money back? Can anybody link me or tell me how to do this?

item.title: [REQ TUT] [PI] Other banking ways
item.dc:creator: @A_G_S_P_U_R_E A G S P U R E
item.description:
@A_G_S_P_U_R_E wrote:

So, something along the lines of;

if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 2000000000)) { c.getItems().deleteItem2(995, 200000000);
But what about withdrawing?

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ TUT] [PI] Other banking ways
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“A G S P U R E, post:3, topic:428525”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=531217.msg3880698#msg3880698 date=1326010193]
So are you wanting me to tell you how to do it?

For a commands just add a condition for the coins. It’d be better to do it through N.P.C. Dialogue though.

If you’re wanting me to spoon-feed the code to you, in the words of Italian Americans everywhere “Ooh!!! You believe this guy??? Forget-about-it”.

Let me know if that wasn’t informative enough, I’ll try to simplify it for you.
[/quote]
All I need to know is how to add a condition for the coins, I also agree that the NPC’s would be better.[/quote]

If (player has item blahblahblah

else

blah blah blah you don’t have enough coins blah blah

Read full topic
